name: Agora API caller
description: A barebones Flask app to route cloud recording calls to Agora.io

BUCKET.description: the name of the S3 bucket you created

API_KEY.description: From the RESTFUL API secret you created on agora (file is 'key_and_secret.txt')

SECRET_KEY.description: From the RESTFUL API secret you created on agora (file is 'key_and_secret.txt')
